name: Table Top Grand Prix (TTGP)
description:
Lights out, and away we roll!

Table Top Grand Prix (TTGP) is a mobile arcade racing game that drops the player into a field of marbles hurtling through treacherous course against a field of fierce competitors!

This  game is a project by a small team from SAE Institute Melbourne.

The current build available is a PC prototype we have uploaded for testing.
